column4: ok so now i am able to load my desktop normal except ... i am stuck in login screen loop
login as guest and do ls -ld /home
see if /home/userid is owned by userid
and yeah, as bfortified noted... it won't hurt one bit to chown it anyway
yes userid is owned by userid
any suggestion on how to fix it
humor us and do: chown -R yourusername:yourusername /home/yourusername
just to make sure that's not the issue
you shouldn't have to... you should be able to just log out and log back in
